Alert Name: bush
White House revises economic forecast down
Slow growth in beginning of year reins in GDP growth to 2.3 percent from 2.9 percent.
06/06/07 12:47 PM, EDT
The Bush administration forecast on Wednesday that U.S. economic growth will be weaker this year than it previously thought and prices will rise faster but said the outlook remained promising.
